product_name: Pacsafe Venturesafe 200 GII Shoulder Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Grab the Venturesafe 200 GII Shoulder Bag and hit the streets. This compact travel bag secures your valuables and your identity thanks to anti-theft security features including an RFID safe pocket.
